_sText:
Lego Dust
=========

This map got a little backstory to it:

When I was around 7/8 years old I played a lot with lego like many children
do, at that time I already knew css so on a day I tried to recreate de_dust not exactly copy but it was as good as I could do back then.

I created the ordinary 5 on 5 player set with custom decals printed and glued onto it to make it look like they're really from CS:S and wanted to make a stop motion movie with that scene.

After many years (26/03/09) I got bored on a night and took out my old lego where I found the still intact at that time the recreation I made of de_dust. With doing so I got the idea to recreate the map for Counter-Strike:Source in hammer so around 2AM I started working until 5AM until the recreation of that lego scene I made as a kid was done and voila that creation is this release!

That's the little backstory to this map and well I hope you like my creation that I made as a kid!
